item.title: Setting Up Obsidian-based Digital Garden website
item.description: First attempt: On first attempt, I was looking to replicate the following Publishing your Vault Online With Quartz I found this method to have a few too many gaps in instruction to replicate his home brewed solution for selective upload of vault files.
